news: [Community] Importing HTTP request submitted by @secfb. It should be easier to import from other tools like burp
[True story] This tool is for my own purpose only, please do not use it. The tool must stay as-is forever, do not ask for any improvement
[GUI] Putting your hand on a GUI makes you look smart? No. Do not use GUI, instead use CLI like any adult
[DNS strategy] You're a security expert? Again no, but give a try to the new DNS strategy, you can test it locally without any domain
[Java] Latest release v0.113 is still compatible Java 11, next release v0.114 will then require Java 21 so prepare and bump your jdk
[Exploit] Give also a try to RCE, UDF and reverse shell and share your thoughts, injection can lead to a shell too
[RCE shell] How to RCE shell and reverse shell with one click? For details go to https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection/wiki/Exploit
[Pinned] Report any bugs and thoughts, and add your star at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection
[Reminder] Do not use this tool, it makes you look weird clicking this and scrolling that
[Community] @secfb also asks for easier target param selection. You win, it will be the final java feature, next I'll switch to python and bump version to 1.0
[Except thin air there's nothing behind you. The room is empty]
